casebody.data:
Roscoe ROBINSON, et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. HARBERT INTERNATIONAL, INC., et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 90-7026

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. Sept. 27, 1990. J. Scott Vowell, Birmingham, Ala., for plaintiffs-appellants. L. Graves, Stiff, III, Thomas L. Selden, Starnes & Atchison, Birmingham, Ala., for defendants-appellees. Before FAY, HATCHETT and EDMONDSON, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM:

The judgment is AFFIRMED based upon the Memorandum Opinion entered by the district court on December 8, 1989, and reported at 743 F.Supp. 797.
